recipe.title: Horseradish Deviled Eggs
ingredients: 12 hard-boiled large eggs, peeled, halved lengthwise
2 teaspoons Champagne vinegar or white wine vinegar
instructions: Preheat broiler. Mash egg yolks with mayonnaise, horseradish, vinegar, and mustard in a medium bowl until smooth. Season with salt and spoon back into egg whites. Sprinkle breadcrumbs over.
Place eggs on a broiler-proof baking sheet and broil, watching closely to prevent burning, until breadcrumbs are toasted, about 3 minutes.
DO AHEAD: Deviled eggs can be filled (not sprinkled with breadcrumbs) up to 6 hours ahead. Cover and chill.
